thread.title: Popular Camping Recipes for Every Meal
thread.title_full: Popular Camping Recipes for Every Meal

title: Popular Camping Recipes for Every Meal
text:
Popular Camping Recipes for Every Meal Our favorite recipes for the campground organized by meal and main ingredient Sign Up for Our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in! There was an error. Please try again. Please select a newsletter. Please enter a valid email address. Did you mean ? Backpacking - Backcountry Camping Updated April 27, 2016 . 
Food always tastes better in the great outdoors, under the stars, and at the campground. Our top-rated most popular camping recipes can be cooked over the campfire or on the camp stove. These easy recipes are organized by meal including breakfast, lunch and dinner, and include camping classics like foil pack hobo dinners, hot dogs, and campfire s'mores. Get easy recipes for camping and find delicious options in any of these categories. You can cook these camping recipes for a crowd, for your family and friends, or a small serving for one. Make fresh bread over the campfire in a dutch oven or coffee can. Henn Photography / Getty Images • Camping Recipes Cooked Over A Campfire 
Sitting around an evening campfire may be a camping tradition, but preparing meals over a campfire has been around since before camping became a popular recreation. Many classic camping recipes (like s'mores , pictured) got their start while sitting around and enjoying a campfire. 
continue reading below our video America's Best Foodie Cities • Camping Recipes For Dinner and Main Course 
The evening meal centers around a main course or camping dinner entree that usually consists of some kind of meat dish. Here you'll find camping recipes that use beef , fish , pork or poultry as the main ingredient. Cooking methods might require a camp stove, Dutch oven or grill. And some can be cooked over the campfire.
